alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County; Union County; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Tularosa Valley, Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County and Union County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Harding County; Quay County; Union County; Upper Tularosa Valley
